title: A Clown Face
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 180 words, Level F (Grade 1), Lexile 340L
description: A Clown Face outlines the steps involved in dressing up to look like a clown. Early readers will enjoy the detailed illustrations that correspond with the repetitive text pattern. They may even be inspired to use the book as a guide to dress up as a clown.
